user.title: Choose what you want to measure
user.description: Time measures the duration of a template rendering to True. Source will measure the value changes of another entity, while a template is rendering to True

source.title: Configure source meter
source.description: Configure the configuration name (used for sensor names and logging), the source to measure and the template that will trigger measuring.

time.title: Configure time meter
time.description: Configure the configuration name (used for sensor names and logging), and the template that will trigger measuring.

periods.title: Choose period configurator
periods.description: Choose how you want to configure periods. Combinations are possible. After that, choose "I'm done"

predefined.title: Configure the period to measure
predefined.description: Pick a predefined period or create a custom one (with duration). Each period becomes a sensor. When finished choose: I'm done.

custom.title: Configure a custom period
custom.description: Configure a recurrence and duration of a custom period.
